text: Lagate tomaloke nija pratipalakara ocarata ksama praarthana karaa, tara pichata te'omra pine ubhati aha, te'om tomalokaka eta nirdista samayara eta uttama jirana upabhoga karaibalai diba arau te'om pratyeka guni byaktika tara praapya maryada pradana karaiba; arau yadi tomaloke mukha ghuraa'i loraa, tente niscaya ma'i tomalokara oparata maha dirasara sastira asanka karao
